body:
SELECT VD.SHIFT, VD.EMPLOYEENO, VD.PSTOPCAUSENAME, VD.STOPSTARTTIME, dbo.GET_HMCLOCK(VD.NONSTOPSPLANNEDTIME) NONSTOPSPLANNEDTIME_FORMATLI,VD.NONSTOPSPLANNEDTIME,  VD.STOPSPLANNEDTIME, VD.COKOTEDURATION,*
FROM VE_DCASSTOPS VD
WHERE VD.TRANSDATE BETWEEN '2024-05-03 00:00:00' AND '2024-05-03 00:00:00' AND VD.PWORKSTATIONID=28
ORDER BY  VD.STOPSTARTTIME DESC
